active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the pros and cons of using open-source note-taking apps like CherryTree or Obsidian versus commercial ones like Notion or OneNote for penetration testing documentation. Consider security implications, collaboration features, and alignment with PTES phases. Support your arguments with real-world examples from pentest workflows.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
